settings.name: Lovish Bhatia
settings.title: AI & Data Analyst
settings.summary: Highly adaptive and detail-oriented professional with expertise in AI chatbot development and data analysis, committed to delivering high-quality results.

items.description: Engineered and deployed a conversational AI chatbot for the company's web application, resulting in a 24/7 self-service customer experience.

items.title: Exploratory Data Analysis of Spotify Dataset
items.description: Performed in-depth exploratory data analysis (EDA) on an 85,000-track Spotify dataset (2015-2025) to uncover trends in music popularity, audio feature behavior, genre patterns, and temporal shifts using Python, Pandas, NumPy, and visualization tools. Communicated insights through interactive visualizations, correlation heatmaps, and trend reports, enabling clear understanding of factors influencing song popularity and showcasing proficiency in data storytelling, statistical analysis, and model interpretation.

items.title: NPLE (2024)
items.description: Secured a winning position at the National Level Project Exhibition 2024-25 organized by Vivekananda Global University. Served as Team Member/Captain of 'Fantastic 4', contributing to project development, presentation, and execution. Successfully competed at a national platform, showcasing innovation, teamwork, and strong problem-solving skills.

items.title: Digital Campus 2.0 on Google Cloud (2024)
items.description: Participated in Digital Campus 2.0 on Google Cloud, a #HackSprint event conducted in collaboration with Google Cloud and Vivekananda Global University. Gained exposure to cloud technologies, collaborative problem-solving, and hands-on digital campus innovation.
